  • weekly picks (Jul 5 week 2022)

  • A WordCloud of 2022 Jul 5th week collection

    1. PhysRevB.106.014518 Revisiting flat band superconductivity: Dependence on minimal quantum metric and band touchings (Bernevig, PRB)

    2. PhysRevB.106.014420 Nonlinear nonreciprocal transport in antiferromagnets free from spin-orbit coupling (Hayami, PRB)

    3. PhysRevB.106.024204 Localization and multifractal properties of the long-range Kitaev chain in the presence of an Aubry-Andr\‘e-Harper modulation (AAH, PRB)

    4. PhysRevB.106.024517 Ubiquitous stripe phase and enhanced electron pairing in the interfacial high-${T}{c}$ superconductor FeSe/${\mathrm{BaTiO}}{3}$ (PRB)

    5. PhysRevB.106.045138 Magnetic and electronic transitions in monolayer electride ${\mathrm{Gd}}_{2}\mathrm{C}$ induced by hydrogenation: A first-principles study (PRB)

    6. PhysRevB.106.045139 Directly probing the chirality of Majorana edge states (majorana, PRB)

    7. 2207.11323 Multiband Superconductors: Two Characteristic Lengths for Each Contributing Condensate (arXiv)

    8. 2207.11468 Pair density wave and loop current promoted by van Hove singularities in moir\‘e systems (arXiv)

    9. 2207.11794 Robust Superconductivity in Quasi-One-Dimensional Multiband Materials (arXiv)

    10. 2207.11845 Superconductivity and hardness of the equiatomic high-entropy alloy HfMoNbTiZr (arXiv)

    11. 2207.11928 Topological characterization and stability of Floquet Majorana modes in Rashba nanowire (arXiv)

    12. 2207.12031 A Topological Kagome Metal Magnesium Triboride (MgB3, arXiv)

    13. 2207.12275 Superconductivity enhanced by pair fluctuations between wide and narrow bands (arXiv)

    14. 2207.11420 Nonreciprocal Transport in Noncoplanar Magnetic Systems without Spin-Orbit Coupling, Net Scalar Chirality, or Magnetization (arXiv)

    15. 2207.11480 Topological quantum transition driven by charge-phonon coupling in higher-order topological insulators (topological quantum transition, arXiv)

    16. 2207.11920 Correlation-driven electronic nematicity in the Dirac semimetal BaNiS2 (nematic, arXiv)

    17. 2207.11982 Quantum-critical conductivity of marginal Fermi-liquids (arXiv)

    18. 2207.12307 Superconductor–Insulator Transition in a non-Fermi Liquid (arXiv)

    19. 2207.12361 High-order nonlinear terahertz probing of the two-band superconductor MgB$_2$ (MgB2, arXiv)

    20. PhysRevB.106.L020404 Spin wave driven domain wall motion in easy-plane ferromagnets: A particle perspective (PRB)

    21. PhysRevB.106.035421 Skyrmion superconductivity: DMRG evidence for a topological route to superconductivity (Zaletel, PRB)

    22. PhysRevB.106.014417 Rectification of the spin Seebeck current in noncollinear antiferromagnets (PRB)

    23. PhysRevB.106.014419 Feasibility of Kitaev quantum spin liquids in ultracold polar molecules (PRB)

    24. PhysRevB.106.024110 Domain switching dynamics in topological antiferroelectric vortex domains (SWCheong, PRB)

    25. PhysRevB.106.035145 One- and two-particle properties of the weakly interacting two-dimensional Hubbard model in proximity to the van Hove singularity (PRB)

    26. PhysRevB.106.035308 Topolectrical circuit realization of quadrupolar surface semimetals (PRB)

    27. PhysRevB.106.045135 Construction of the spectral function from noncommuting spectral moment matrices (SBlugel, PRB)

    28. PhysRevB.106.045137 Enhanced $d\text{\ensuremath{-}}p$ hybridization intertwined with anomalous ground state formation in the van der Waals itinerant magnet ${\mathrm{Fe}}{5}{\mathrm{GeTe}}{2}$ (PRB)

    29. 2207.10687 Vortex-enabled Andreev processes in quantum Hall-superconductor hybrids (SC-QHE, arXiv)

    30. 2207.10847 Unconventional superconductivity after the BCS paradigm and empirical rules for the exploration of high temperature superconductors (HHWen, arXiv)

    31. 2207.10863 Strong electron-phonon coupling and predicted highest known $T_{c}$ of MXenes revealed in 2H-Mo$_{2}$N under biaxial stress (arXiv)

    32. 2207.10932 Magnetotransport in overdoped La$_{2-x}$Sr$_x$CuO$_4$: effect of anisotropic scattering (arXiv)

    33. 2207.10981 Frustrated magnetic interactions in FeSe (arXiv)
